channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping on Brook Lane/Ash Lane again, 15th March
item.description:
This is the second occurrence of fly tipping right by the gates to contractor parking

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Lane, Down Hatherley, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed bump damages and pothole forcing traffic into the centre of the road when heading towards Sandy lane. There are a couple of potholes near this area aswell., 15th March
item.description:
Just beyond the gates to coxs meadow where they are speed bumps in both lanes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Moorend Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement unsafe due to water debris, 15th March
item.description:
The pavement on Ermin Way between the temporary traffic lights and Beefeater pub is unsafe to walk on. Continued flooding from #5199550, #5613675 and #5549554 has washed over the pavement and residue and debris makes it slippery underfoot.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Potholes near temporary lights, 15th March
item.description:
On Ermin Way near the temporary traffic lights towards the Cirencester Road end there are multiple potholes forming due to the water issue still not being resolved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The complete section of lane 1 of the carriageway heading towards Gloucester upto the slip road to join m5 needs a resuface, it’s very uneven and extremely bumpy. Unavoidable and dangerous on a 70mph carriageway, 15th March
item.description:
As you exit the roundabout heading along the A40 towards Gloucester lane 1 all the way until you turn off to join m5 (BMW garage on your left)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The timber fencing to the communal verge area has been hit exposing metal fittings leaving it as a danger to pedestrians especially as it is unlit at nighttime., 15th March
item.description:
At the Junction between Guinevere Road and Tennyson Road close to Nº 39 Tennyson Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Tennyson Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: No Mirror where there used to be one, 15th March
item.description:
T junction between Naunton Park Road and Naunton Lane. There was a mirror there until it was recently damaged and removed. It was incredibly useful for coming out of a blind junction. When is it going to be replaced?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thirlestaine Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Damage to Glos CC grass verge by illegal(?) overnight parking on Langley Road during Race week., 15th March
item.description:
Langley Road, outside Meadow Lea and other properties. Commenced this week, during Race week. Overnight parking of a. horse box and b. (formerly) 'Refrigerator van and sleeping in.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langley Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
